title: Let GSPI Holder have a better say on project Coin maker
body:
While I understand why making votes exclusively on our governance system would be a loss of other communities engagement and a Risk for pump and dump, I believe we could find a middle ground to make gspi holders having a better say in this since it's basicaly its very first utility.
So why not for example, use our governance system to vote for who will be the next three that will be competing?
Like for example, the team making a proposal with maybe 3 or 4 different group of 3 projects and we will vote each week which group will be the next to be voted on twitter
choices: Yes that's not a bad Idea and gives gspi some more voting utility
author: 0xA2cF7A1E7E6f857478f72105DE598bb2bf5DfdDe
